original: Bane, Per Arne, civiHngenjör, Göteborg, f. 24/7/16 i St. Köpinge, Mal-möh. 1. G. 42 m. Eivor Almér. Barn: Kristina f. 43, Olof 44. — Tekn. stud:-ex. v. Malmö tekn. lärov. 36, ex. v. CTH (kemi) 41. Res. t. Danm., Tyskl., Belg., Frankr. o. Norge 39. Anst. v. Sv. Sockerfabr. A-B socker-fabr. i Arlöv 37, v. Sv. Oljeslageri A-B i Gbg sed. 42. Hobby: musik.
translated: Bane, Per Arne, civil engineer, Gothenburg, b. 24/7/16 in St. Köpinge, Malmöhus County. Married in 1942 to Eivor Almér. Children: Kristina b. 1943, Olof b. 1944. - Graduated with a degree in engineering from Malmö Technical School in 1936, and from Chalmers University of Technology (chemistry) in 1941. Worked in Denmark, Germany, Belgium, France, and Norway in 1939. Employed by Swedish Sugar Factory AB in Arlöv in 1937 and by Swedish Oil Factory AB in Gothenburg since 1942. Hobby: music.
